entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
